hr.fer.zemris.java.custom.scripting.nodes

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.custom.scripting.nodes.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentNode, EchoNode, ForLoopNode, TextNode

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class of all graph nodes.
    Author:
    Erik Banek

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Node()
      Constructs a Node, initializes underlying array to null.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void addChildNode(Node child)
      Adds a direct child node.

      Converts Node content back into string form.

      Gets the child that is placed in array[argument].

    • Constructor Detail

      • Node

        public Node()
        Constructs a Node, initializes underlying array to null.

    • Method Detail

      • addChildNode

        public void addChildNode(Node child)
        Adds a direct child node. Initializes array if that is the first child to be added.
        Parameters:
        child - to be added to the array of children.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if child is null.

      • numberOfChildren

        public int numberOfChildren()
        Gets the size of underlying array, if no children were added to array returns 0.
        Returns:
        0 if array is null, else size of array.

      • getChild

        public Node getChild(int index)
        Gets the child that is placed in array[argument].
        Parameters:
        index - of child that is wanted. Should be between 0 and numberOfChildren()-1 inclusively.
        Returns:
        wanted child.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the underlying array wasn't initialized.
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is not in correct bounds.

      • generateText

        public java.lang.String generateText()
        Converts Node content back into string form. Serves mainly for checking the correctness of SmartScriptParser.
        Returns:
        string content of a node.
